santha josap was widyalaya; palamu inima siyaluma dena dawi 121 (46.5) achintha deshan 26, thenuka perera 3/06, rahul gunasekara 2/09, anudith wikramasinha 2/18, sidath siriwardhana 2/19 wesli widyalaya; palamu inima (palamu dinayata tharagaya nathara karana wita panduwara 49kadi kadulu 9k dawi 148) siyaluma dena dawi 152 (53.4) rahul gunasekara 38, buddhima wijesundara 27, lakshan ruwantha 24, menusha perera 4/56, nipun dhananjaya 4/55 santha josap was widyalaya; dewani inima kadulu 9k dawi 186 (59.3) kawindu madhuranga 43, onel ilangasekara 31, anudith wikramasinha 2/07, nimthaka adhikari 2/16 wesli widyalaya; dewani inima kadulu 5k dawi 120 (31) buddhima wijesundara 52, sahil dayas 30, nimthaka adhikari 21, kaushan chamalka 2/24, nipun dhananjaya 2/53 86 wani santhuwarayinge gatumata siyalla sudanam merata pradhanathama katholika pasal dwithwayak wana santha josap widyalaya saha santha pithara..
